events.message: I recently received my order but I want to request a refund because the item does not meet my expectations and I am not satisfied with the purchase.
The reported problem involves a refund request where the customer wants their money back due to dissatisfaction with the product.
Assigning this refund request case to an available customer support agent for further assistance and processing.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to request a refund, and I'm here to help resolve this issue for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for requesting a refund? This will help us process your request more quickly.
My order number is 123456789. I want a refund because the product color was completely different from what was shown on the website and it looks very poor quality.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund for your order. Please return the item within the next 14 days using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
I appreciate your prompt response and the refund offer. I will send the item back as soon as I receive the return label.
We have sent the prepaid return label to your email. Once we receive the returned item, we will process your refund promptly.
Just checking in to confirm if you have sent the return package. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I shipped the package yesterday via the prepaid label. Let me know once you receive it and process the refund.
We received the returned item and have completed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for your cooperation. Your refund case is now closed. Please contact us if you need any more assistance in the future.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
